titre: Myriam Naeem ▷ Data Scientist | Data Analyst
footer-line1: Made by Jade Dupont with React JS
about-line1: Graduated from a master degree in Webmarketing, I am passionnate about data and the implementation of concrete recommendations, I have worked for pure players where the importance of data was structuring.
about-line2: Moreover, my experience in digital marketing and my technical skills allow me to be in phase with the business needs and technical constraints.
about-line3: Eager to learn new things, I am available now to take up new challenges where the issue of data is paramount.

skills.description: Definition of the business need and KPIs in order to collect relevant data.
Analyze and clean data in order to make recommendations and optimizations.
Creation of dashboards to monitor KPIs and help the different teams make decisions.
Realization and optimization of Machine Learning & Deep Learning models.
Deployment and work sharing with the team. Monitoring and follow-up of the dashboards.

projects.description: Determine whether or not a patient has heart disease. The data is taken from Kaggle.
Estimate the price of bulldozers according to their characteristics. The data is taken from Kaggle.
Predict whether the red wine will be of good or bad quality. The data is taken from Kaggle.
Indicate the breed of a dog from its picture. The data is taken from Kaggle.

contact-text: Do not hesitate to contact me, I will be delighted to discuss with you!
